David Warner fell to Arshdeep Singh's away swing
Mitchell Starc's most expensive over in T20Is (29 runs)

Australia targeted the best player in the opposition, taking out Virat Kohli early in the game
Australia left out a spinner for a fast bowler in the powerplay
Post-Match Reflections: Australia are under severe pressure after losing the game
Rohit Sharma's performance is considered a key reason for India's win
David Warner might have walked off for the last time in international cricket

Pitch conditions were similar to the England vs South Africa game, not high-scoring
